CmdLine: apk add --no-cache         freetype-dev         icu-dev         libjpeg-turbo-dev         libmcrypt-dev         libpng-dev         libxml2-dev         libzip-dev     && apk add gnu-libiconv --no-cache --repository http://dl-cdn.alpinelinux.org/alpine/edge/community/     && curl -L -o /tmp/redis.tar.gz https://github.com/phpredis/phpredis/archive/4.2.0.tar.gz     && tar xfz /tmp/redis.tar.gz     && rm -r /tmp/redis.tar.gz     && mkdir -p /usr/src/php/ext     && mv phpredis-4.2.0 /usr/src/php/ext/redis     && docker-php-ext-configure gd --with-freetype-dir=/usr/include/ --with-jpeg-dir=/usr/include/ --with-png-dir=/usr/include/     && docker-php-ext-configure zip --with-libzip     && docker-php-ext-install -j$(nproc)         gd         intl         mcrypt         mysql         mysqli         opcache         pdo_mysql         redis         soap         zip     && sed -i         -e 's/^\(;\|\)\(pm.max_children =\).*/\2 128/'         -e 's/^\(;\|\)\(pm.start_servers =\).*/\2 16/'         -e 's/^\(;\|\)\(pm.min_spare_servers =\).*/\2 8/'         -e 's/^\(;\|\)\(pm.max_spare_servers =\).*/\2 16/'         -e 's/^\(;\|\)\(pm.max_requests =\).*/\2 1000/'         /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
Commands.Name: run
